description.en: 1337x is a search engine to find your favorite torrents.
description.tr: 1337x, en sevdiğiniz torrentleri bulmak için bir arama motorudur.
description.nl: 1337x is een zoekmachine om je favoriete torrents te vinden.
description.zh_CN: 1337x是一个搜索引擎，可查找您喜欢的BitTorrent文件。
description.zh_TW: 1337x是一個搜索引擎，可查找您喜歡的BitTorrent檔案。
description.ga_IE: 1337x is inneall cuardaigh é chun do chuid torrentí is fearr leat a aimsiú.
